boardgame.name: Wits _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Wagers Family
Wits and Wagers Family Deluxe Edition
Zet in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Win
boardgame.description: Wits _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Wagers Family is the family version of the most award winning party game in history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This edition is more simple, has less down time, and is more portable than the original Wits _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Wagers. It also removes the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;gambling_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; element and has questions that are appropriate for kids and the whole family. Most importantly, Wits _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Wagers Family makes use of the beloved Meeple playing piece!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;How to Play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1) A question is asked._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2) Everyone writes down a guess._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3) The guesses are placed face-up on the table and ordered smallest to largest._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4) Place your Meeples on the guess that you think is closest to the right answer._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Feeling confident? Place a Meeple on your guess._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Think your kids knows better? Place your Meeples on their guess._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Have no idea? Bet on any guess and hope you get lucky!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scoring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You can score up to 4 points on each question:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 point for correctly placing the Small Meeple_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 points for correctly placing the Large Meeple_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 point if your guess is closest_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first player to 15 points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;125 Question Cards (150 in first edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Dry Erase Boards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Dry Erase Pens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Permanent Answer Board (with a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Large Meeples (worth 2 points)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Small Meeples (worth 1 point)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Dry Erase Score Board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Full-color Rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand New in Shrink! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard Shipping to USA48: $9.00 I will combine shipping to save you money when ordering multiple games. Standard shipping is UPS Ground. Other shipping options are available upon request (Next Day / USPS / FEDEX). Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. International orders are shipped via USPS First Class (under 4 pounds) or USPS Priority Mail (up to 70 pounds per box). Contact for shipping quote. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. Thank-you, Mr. B ROCKIN’ B GAMES www.rockinbgames.com mrb.rockinbgames@gmail.com

I will ship via whatever method you prefer. International buyers please note... shipping overseas is EXPENSIVE.
